page.title: 10Life-styles: Rosneath (1)
page.content: Rosneath & Clynder Community Assoc. (voluntary body) runs Scottish Country Dancing class, discos, film shows, dances, jumble sales, whist & beetle drives, Playgroup, Senior Citizens Club, Mothers & Under 5's, Slimmers Club, CB Radio, Yoga, Keep Fit,Piping, Bingo, A.A. Also provides Mini bus for affiliated groups. Youth activities every day except Saturday. Usual uniformed organisation plus youth club. Meals on wheels for house-bound elderly Monday & Thursday. Luncheon Club Tuesday & Friday for others. Gala Day annually in May & Highland Games annually in July. Children's class for Majorettes, Highland, Ballet & Tap Dancing. Â£1 per lesson.
